title: Modular access to furo[3,2-c]chromen-4-ones via Yb(OTf)3-catalyzed [3 + 2] annulation of 4-hydroxycoumarins with β-nitroalkenes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19581-19585
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03962A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hua Wang, Qin Ma, Yifei Xu, Yanyan Sun, Siyuan Zhao, Shaoyin Wang, Xinwei He
We have developed a facile and efficient strategy for modular access to furo[3,2-c]chromen-4-ones by formation of furan ring from readily available starting materials with broad functional group compatibility in a single step.
